scripts.schema:validate: ajv validate --spec=draft2020 --all-errors --strict=false --validate-formats=false -s schemas/universal/product.json -d examples/products/get-by-id.json && ajv validate --spec=draft2020 --all-errors --strict=false --validate-formats=false -s schemas/overlays/off/product.overlay.json -d examples/off/product.sample.json
scripts.generate:examples: npm run map:off && npm run schema:validate
